powerupCardDeck.effect: You may play this card when you are dealing damage to one or more targets.Pay 1 ammo cube of any color.Choose 1 of those targets and give it an extra point of damage.
powerupCardDeck.Note: You cannot use this to do 1 damage to a target that is receiving only marks.

powerupCardDeck.effect: You may play this card on your turn before or after any action. Choose any other player's figure and move it 1 or 2 squares in one direction.
powerupCardDeck.Note: You can't use this to move a figure after it respawns at the end of your turn. That would be too late.

powerupCardDeck.effect: You may play this card when you receive damage from a player you can see. Give that player 1 mark.
You may play this card on your turn before or after any action. Pick up your figure and set it down on any square of the board.
powerupCardDeck.note: You can't use this after you see where someone respawns at the end of your turn. By then it is too late.
